description: Applies a schema extension to a Microsoft AD directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory for which the schema extension will be applied to.

parameters.name: CreateSnapshotBeforeSchemaExtension
parameters.description: If true, creates a snapshot of the directory before applying the schema extension.

parameters.name: LdifContent
parameters.description: The LDIF file represented as a string. To construct the LdifContent string, precede each line as it would be formatted in an ldif file with n. See the example request below for more details. The file size can be no larger than 1MB.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of the schema extension.

nested_items.name: SchemaExtensionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the schema extension that will be applied.
